plays.text: Goal scored by Rostislav Klesla assisted by Geoff Sanderson and Robert Kron
Penalty to Kevin Dineen 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Jim Dowd 2 minutes for Tripping Mattias Timander
Penalty to Jean-Luc Grand-Pierre 2 minutes for Crosschecking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Sergei Zholtok assisted by Lubomir Sekeras and Andrew Brunette
Penalty to Sylvain Blouin 5 minutes for Fighting Jody Shelley
Penalty to Jody Shelley 5 minutes for Fighting Sylvain Blouin
Penalty to Sylvain Blouin 10 minutes for Misconduct Jody Shelley
2 minute Bench Penalty for Instigator served by Andrew Brunette
Goal scored by Geoff Sanderson assisted by Ray Whitney and Espen Knutsen
Penalty to Grant Marshall 2 minutes for Roughing Brad Brown
Penalty to Richard Park 2 minutes for Tripping Tyler Wright
Penalty to Antti Laaksonen 2 minutes for Slashing Tyler Wright
Penalty to Tyler Wright 2 minutes for Tripping(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Jason Marshall assisted by Nick Schultz and Darby Hendrickson
Penalty to Wes Walz 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Marc Denis
Goal scored by Deron Quint assisted by Espen Knutsen and Ray Whitney
Penalty to Jean-Luc Grand-Pierre 2 minutes for Holding(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Sergei Zholtok 2 minutes for Holding Tyler Wright
Goal scored by Sergei Zholtok unassisted
